attributes.action: Review court hearings to allow a parent or anyother person who is more than cable of substiting a solicitor due to unaffordability when legal aid isn't allowed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My daughter was involved in a road accident, Dec 4th 08 near our home, was hit by a car from behind her, overtaken & sideswiped. 

Varying statements of have reached the magistrates crt.

Photos of damage to the cars shows the discrepancies in statements. Legal cost of £5k to fight the case is unaffordable.

Due to health & finances we are close to losing our home & more. 

My daughter has never dealt with a court case before but I am able as I have presented specifics in the past to legal groups. I have spent many hours preparing notes but the court have advised that I am not allowed to represent my daughter.

This is unfair to anyone who cannot afford a legal team & discriminates my abilities to that of a paid legal.

Being her father is irrelevent, it is about being able to present the facts clearly to illustrate the pattern of events for all to make a fair & final judgement.

The case is due in Glouc Mag-Crt, 17th Aug to discuss the statements etc, the main hearing is 11th Sept 09.

She is accused of driving without due care & attention, she was driving in the correct position & the leading vehicle.  

Please can you look at human rights on this point.


Graham Jackson

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
